lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.text: Markets got you stressed? Botspot's AI agents can help you analyze market data efficiently, empowering you to make informed decisions. Try it now!

scenes.visual_prompt: Raw photo, 8k uhd, dslr, soft lighting, high quality, film grain, Fujifilm XT3, A male hand, 30s-40s, knuckles white and slightly trembling, with visible pores and natural skin texture, hovering over a computer mouse on a dark desk. The computer screen, out of focus but visible, displays a rapidly crashing red stock chart with intricate graph lines and sharp, analytical data points.
scenes.audio_prompt: Quiet corporate office atmosphere, with subtle, anxiety-inducing keyboard clicks and mouse movements.
scenes.motion_prompt: Static and locked-off camera, no movement, holding the extreme close-up view with contemplative framing, centered in safe zone.

scenes.visual_prompt: Raw photo, 8k uhd, dslr, soft lighting, high quality, film grain, Fujifilm XT3, The same 38-year-old male trader from scene 1, Caucasian, with short, messy brown hair and visible five o'clock shadow, wearing a crumpled light blue button-up shirt. He is slumped over his desk, head in hands, clearly frazzled and exhausted, with visible pores and slight wrinkles on his face. A large monitor in front of him prominently displays crashing red stock charts with complex data visualizations.
scenes.audio_prompt: Quiet corporate office atmosphere, soft distressed sighs, and very subtle, distant city sounds.
scenes.motion_prompt: Static and locked-off camera from an overhead bird's eye view, framing the trader from chest to head and his monitor, product centered perfectly in frame, symmetrical balance, no jarring movements.

scenes.visual_prompt: Raw photo, 8k uhd, dslr, soft lighting, high quality, film grain, Fujifilm XT3, The same 38-year-old male trader from scene 2, now relaxed and smiling, sipping coffee, with natural pores and clear skin texture. Standing casually beside him is Tom, a 45-year-old man, Caucasian, with neatly combed dark brown hair, a warm and confident smile, wearing a clean, fitted Botspot-branded emerald green polo shirt, his skin showing natural texture and minimal imperfections. The computer monitor now displays vibrant green profit charts and positive growth indicators.
scenes.audio_prompt: Quiet corporate office atmosphere, with the gentle clinking of a coffee cup and a relaxed, satisfied hum.
scenes.motion_prompt: Gentle and slow push-in movement towards the subjects, smoothly increasing emphasis and providing a definitive ending, centered in safe zone.
